title: New: Oscar Key Sung – It's Coming / Sure Thing (Miguel Cover)
body:
It’s been a minute since we last heard from Melbourne multi-talented producer **Oscar Key Sung**, and what better way to announce your return than with a **Miguel** cover? The B-side to new single _It’s Coming_, **Oscar Key Sung’s** take on _Sure Thing_ is choppy and slightly distracted at times, a fitting accompaniment to the flip-side, a soulful R&B number, that mixes his unconventional stylings with more modern, hip hop arrangements.

Check out both below.
